attributes.action: Change the word brexit to help this country move positively
attributes.additional_details: We know we have to move forward but Brexit now has a negative feel to it and needs to be change for something more positive
attributes.background: The word brexit now has a negative connotation to it and we need to stop the racism and homophobic attacks that have been on the increase since this has happened

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the words that people choose to use.
